name: UiSound

arguments.name: panAzimuth
arguments.desc: Playback stereo panning azimuth (-PI to PI). Default 0.0.

arguments.name: panDepth
arguments.desc: Playback stereo panning depth (0.0 to 1.0). Default 1.0.

description: UI sounds are not affected by acoustics simulation. Use LoadSound / PlaySound for that.
